author: James
content: Hi guys. I am sorry. My do dilligence was wrong. I am now a NADVAD long. My pluts did not do good.

author: Sleep Merriq
content: What a splendid day if I do say myself! Congrats fellow longs - a new record and earnings just around the corner.

author: BL
content: Bullish: Finally the market can run, unburdened by what has been 😃
